configuration.name: DENIED_MESSAGE
configuration.label: What message should be sent when a login is denied?
configuration.description: When Fingerprint denies login for any of the above reasons we will respond with an error message. Enter a generic denial message for failed logins. This message should not reveal any specific details about the reason for the denial.

configuration.name: EXPOSE_VISITOR_IDS
configuration.label: Expose visitor IDs as a custom claim
configuration.description: When enabled, the list of visitor IDs will be included as a custom claim in the ID token, making it accessible to your app.

options.label: Yes, include visitor IDs as a custom claim
No, do not include visitor IDs as a custom claim
